name: 胡國英
objective:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of linear circuits. Contents include:
1) Introduction to linear circuit analyses; 2) Resistive circuits; 3) Kirchhoff laws; 4) Thevenin and Norton theorems; 5) First and second order circuits; 6) Node and loop analysis; 7) Steady state responses and analyses; 8) AC circuit: AC steady-state analyses, phasor analyses; 9) Three phase circuits; 10) Transformer circuits; 11) Frequency responses; 12) Fourier series, Fourier transformation and applications; 13) Laplace transformation and applications.
